title: Where is Wolf (Kindred)?
body: I have zero doubt that this has been brought up way back when TFT first came out, .. but why is Wolf not present for Kindred, only Lamb?

replies.body:
Riot August said he would add Wolf in Patch 9.14.
Clearly he lied just to get people to shut up because a lot of people were upset Wolf wasn't with Lamb.
Or plans changed... jumping to the conclusion of lying is quite disgusting.

> [{quoted}](name=Porglit,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=f1tmKuiu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-09-15T16:12:21.178+0000)
>
> Or plans changed... jumping to the conclusion of lying is quite disgusting.

He's stopped talking about it since and ignores when people asked what happened.

And unless he answers that particular question out of the hundreds asked, he's intentionally lying??? 
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=Daszkal,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=f1tmKuiu,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-09-16T01:05:10.265+0000)
>
> Talking about doing something then not doing what was said is technically lying, now he's being intentionally neglectful. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Or he didn't follow through because plans changed behind the scenes, and you simply don't have full knowledge of the situation.  Give the guy the benefit of the doubt.
